Introduction

NCT WISH is a six-member boy group under SM Entertainment and the sixth and final sub-unit of NCT. They made their debut on February 21st, 2024, through the "SMTOWN Live 2024: SMCU Palace@Tokyo", before releasing the single "Wish" on February 28th.

On October 2nd, 2023, SM Entertainment announced that Jungmin would be departing from the group and returning to be a trainee due to health concerns. The group would continue their activities with six members.
